text: Not later than September 15, 2003, the Mayor shall submit to the Council an analysis of the expenses of the Fund, which analysis shall include a recommendation as to whether the tax imposed under § 34-1803 should be adjusted. In preparing this analysis:
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90-day) addition, see § 502(e) of Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-105, June 20 2003, 50 DCR 5613).

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 502(e) of Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-149, September 22, 2003, 50 DCR 8360).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 15-39, see notes following § 34-1801.

DC CODE § 34-1805

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: It shall be assumed that funding for call center operating personnel will be shifted from the Fund to the General Fund of the District of Columbia; and
A replacement reserve schedule for all technology equipment and software shall be used.

chapter.text: Emergency and Non-Emergency Number Telephone System Assessments Fund.
